title: Hour 1: Must-Win?
description:
Chris "Mad Dog" Russo calls Sunday's match-up with the Eagles a must-win for the Cowboys. Plus Dominique Foxworth has a defensive player winning the MVP this season. Later, Stephen A. reacts to the latest in the Draymond Green debacle, and says this will be his last season in Golden State. Lastly, Kimberly Martin joins the crew to debate whether or not the New York Giants will make the playoffs.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
